data.title: VZ Stock Price, Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Verizon Communications, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of communications, information, and entertainment products and services
data.text:
Here’s How Kamala Harris Is Embracing Memes Like Charli XCX’s ‘Brat Summer’ And ‘Project Coconut Tree’

@KamalaHQ, an X account for Vice President Kamala Harris’s presidential campaign, updated its cover photo on X to imitate Charli XCX’s neon-green “Brat” album cover.

Billie Eilish’s New Album’s Entire Tracklist Is Still Charting, Months After Its Release

All 10 songs from Billie Eilish's new album Hit Me Hard and Soft are still present on Billboard's Hot Rock & Alternative Songs chart, two months after they debuted.

Top Trends Driving The Future Of The Automotive Industry

Auto industry future by 2030 is expected to achieve over 100mn sales, 2bn cars on road and car companies will transition to becoming versatile multi industrial entities

‘Kingdom Of The Planet Of The Apes’ Lands Hulu Streaming Premiere Date

The summer movie blockbuster "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" is coming soon to streaming on Hulu. Click in to find out when.

Secret Service Director: Gunman Was Identified As ‘Suspicious’ But Not A ‘Threat’

Kimberly Cheatle said during the congressional hearing the agency “failed.”

Major Democratic Donors Split On Kamala Harris' Presidential Run—As Small Donations Surge

Democratic megadonors Alex Soros and Reid Hoffman have endorsed Harris.

Harris Praises Biden In First Speech Since Launching Presidential Run

Harris spoke from the White House while hosting college athletes for NCAA Sports Day.

Kamala Harris Could Make Abortion A Bigger Issue In Election Over Biden—Here’s Why

Reproductive rights groups came out in favor of the vice president’s candidacy as she’s pushed abortion rights across the country.

Joni Mitchell Matches Her All-Time Best Showing On A Billboard Chart

Joni Mitchell ties her career peak on Billboard's Vinyl Albums chart as The Hissing of Summer Lawns debuts at No. 6.

Is Kamala Harris Good For Stocks? ‘Blue’ Sectors Like Tech Lead Monday Market Rally

Monday’s big tech bounceback came after stocks’ worst week in three months.

JD Vance Is Outselling Kamala Harris On Amazon's Book Chart—For Now

As Vance and Harris move up their respective presidential tickets, their books are following on the bestseller charts.

Why Supreme May Be As Bad A Deal For EssilorLuxottica As It Was For VF

VF is selling Supreme to EssilorLuxottica for $1.5 billion, far less than it paid in 2020. Since then, Supreme has fallen hard in the fast-paced streetwear business.

The Biden-Harris Climate-Energy Agenda Vs. The Trump-Vance One: Two Realities

Imagine not getting hurricane or tornado warnings. Trump's Project 2025 eliminates NOAA (the weather service). Here's a Harris admin. vs Trump 2.0 in climate and energy

While Vikings Focus On QB1, Defense Has Chance To Flourish Under Flores

If the Vikings are going to overcome expectations, it will likely be the result of defensive coordinator Brian Flores’ planning and the execution of his players.

Three Of Taylor Swift’s Albums Return To The Same Chart Simultaneously

Taylor Swift claims six spaces on the 25-rung Vinyl Albums chart, as three of her bestsellers—and former No. 1s—return to the Billboard tally.
